parameters.name: AutoBuild
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable automatic image building when code is committed. Valid values:

*   `true`: enables automatic image building when code is committed.
*   `false`: disables automatic image building when code is committed.

parameters.name: CodeRepoId
parameters.description: The ID of the source code repository.

parameters.name: CodeRepoName
parameters.description: The name of the source code repository.

parameters.name: CodeRepoNamespaceName
parameters.description: The namespace to which the source code repository belongs.

parameters.name: CodeRepoType
parameters.description: The type of the source code hosting platform. Valid values: GITHUB, GITLAB, GITEE, CODE, and CODEUP.

parameters.name: DisableCacheBuild
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to disable building caches. Valid values:

*   `true`: disables building caches.
*   `false`: enables building caches.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Container Registry Enterprise Edition instance.

parameters.name: OverseaBuild
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable Build With Servers Deployed Outside Chinese Mainland. Valid values:

*   `true`: enables Build With Servers Deployed Outside Chinese Mainland.
*   `false`: disables Build With Servers Deployed Outside Chinese Mainland.

parameters.name: RepoId
parameters.description: The ID of the image repository.
